page.title: 11Gargrave, The High Street
page.content: The appearance of this attractive street is marred only by the Co-op, which is out of scale with the other buildings. Apart from places of refreshment (pp. 9 & 10), High Street contains 2{Antique Shops,}2{Art {Galleries,}(The Logan Gallery belongs to a well known artist of Dales scenes). 2 Ladies{Hairdressers}and 1 for men, a sub-branch of Barclay's{Bank}(open Mon.& Wed), Halifax{Building Society,} the{Pharmacy,}the{Newsagent,}the{ {Butcher,}2{Grocers}and a{Greengrocer,} 3{Gift Shops,}High Street{Garage,}a branch of the County{Library}(open Mon. Wed. Fri.& Sat.for 2 or 3 hrs.) and the{Post Office. {Early Closing} is on Tuesday, but many shops remain open - particularly in summer.
